chatHistory.message: Hi everyone! I'm Meeting Bot, a virtual assistant here to help monitor and support today's session. I'm not a real participant, but I'm here to observe, take notes, or assist with automated tasks if needed. Let me know if there's anything you'd like me to pass along!
Don't let me forget to schedule my cat's birthday!

meetingSummary:
Evan gave a short demo on the Zoom companion application, noting the speech-to-text transcription feature. A quick chat message was sent before ending the meeting. Meeting Bot introduced itself as a virtual assistant for the session; Evan also mentioned needing to schedule his cat's birthday in the chat.

*   Schedule Evan's cat's birthday.
